content.question: The derivative of the function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is given by <math alttext="f prime of x, equals, the square root of x, end root, times the sine of, open parenthesis, 3 times the square root of x, close parenthesis " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>. On which of the following intervals in <math alttext=" open bracket, 0 comma 6 pi, close bracket " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>π</mi><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> decreasing?

choices.label: <math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 1.097, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>1.097</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="open bracket, 4.386 comma 9.870, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mn>4.386</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>9.870</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="open bracket, 17.546 comma 18.850, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>17.546</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>18.850</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open bracket, 0.457 comma 2.682, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0.457</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2.682</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="open bracket, 7.073 comma 13.654, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>7.073</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>13.654</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open bracket, 1.097 comma 4.386, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>1.097</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4.386</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="open bracket, 9.870 comma 17.546, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>9.870</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>17.546</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 0.457, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0.457</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="open bracket, 2.682 comma 7.073, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>2.682</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>7.073</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="open bracket, 13.654 comma 18.850, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>13.654</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>18.850</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open bracket, 1.097 comma 4.386, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>1.097</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4.386</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="open bracket, 9.870 comma 17.546, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>9.870</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>17.546</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
